commit.message:
Auto merge of #36316 - jseyfried:custom_derive_internal_unstable, r=eddyb

Avoid instaiblity errors in code generated by `syntax_ext::deriving::call_intrinsic()`

r? @eddyb

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@

+// except according to those terms.
+
+// aux-build:custom_derive_partial_eq.rs
+// ignore-stage1
+// ignore-pretty : (#23623) problems when  ending with // comments
+
+#![feature(plugin, custom_derive)]
+#![plugin(custom_derive_partial_eq)]
+#![allow(unused)]
+
+#[derive(CustomPartialEq)] // Check that this is not a stability error.
+enum E { V1, V2 }
+
+fn main() {}
